==Features==
 * AtMega1284P with Arduino bootloader.
 * LiPo charger with JST 2 battery plug.
 * Arduino programming header.
 * Micro-usb connector to charge the battery and run the board.
 * JD-T1800 (from Adafruit).
 * 4 buttons or one rocker switch
<br>

== Options==
The board can also accept a 5 way switch instead of 4 switches.<br>
Since the 5 way switch uses the same pins as the buttons, it is not possible to use the 5-way-switch and 2 buttons at the same time.<br>
